title: I’m A Male Mom in a Nightmare Game - Novel Updates
tags: Black Belly   Charismatic Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Children   Forgetful Protagonist   Friendship   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Monsters   Mpreg   Seme Protagonist   S*xual Abuse   Strong Love Interests   Survival Game   System Administrator   Tragic Past
author: 玫/Mei
description:
As an innocent passerby who was involved in a nightmare game, Xu Yintang was faced with a dreadful dungeon that could kill him at any time. He happily expressed that the dungeon environment was very friendly, the NPC was very friendly, and gave him a cute and obedient biological cub.

In short, the game experience is very good, and it is as happy as returning home.

The cubs also agreed, everyone in the dungeon is good-looking, delicious and fun, they want to come next time.

Everyone who is about to be eaten to extinction: Don't come here!
>
